consentSummaries.summaryMessage: The follwing is the summary of your consent along with our data management practices.

items.title: How often we’ll access your data?
items.message: We will do this multiple times daily to retrieve your data to give you up to date inforamtion. We will do this only  during the Sharing Period.

consentSummaries.summaryTitle: What happen to your data after you stop sharing with us?
consentSummaries.summaryMessage: We will delete your CDR data when the consent expires or when you decide to stop sharing data with us unless it is required to be retained by Australian Law.

directUrl.title: See how we delete your data

items.title: Where to manage this agreement
items.message: All of this information will be made available on your Data Sharing dashboard. You can access it by going to Settings -> Data Sharing.

items.title: If you want to stop sharing this data
items.message: You can stop us collecting and using your datta on your Data Sharing dashboard or by writing to cdr_au@101digital.io.

consentSummaries.summaryTitle: Do you consent to share this data with us?
consentSummaries.summaryMessage: Selecting “I consent” won’t gove us access to your data just yet. We will need to connect with your bank to confirm this decision.
